rdfs:comment: Hey, you've found the JSON-LD context for ConceptNet. This file defines everything that appears in ConceptNet API responses, mostly for the benefit of software that understands JSON-LD, but I hope it's reasonably human-readable too. See http://www.conceptnet.io for more information about ConceptNet, http://api.conceptnet.io/docs for the API documentation, or http://json-ld.org/ for an introduction to JSON-LD.
dc:creator: rspeer@luminoso.com

rel.comment: The 'rel' property labels the kind of relationship that holds between two terms. This is the same as RDF's notion of a 'predicate'.

start.comment: The 'start' property labels the node that this edge points from. This is the same as RDF's notion of a 'subject'.

end.comment: The 'end' property labels the node that this edge points to. This is the same as RDF's notion of an 'object'.

weight.comment: A numerical value indicating how strongly one should believe the statement this edge makes.

edges.comment: When you look up a node, its 'edges' property is a list of its incoming and outgoing edges.

sources.comment: A set of independent sources that are reasons we believe this assertion.

dataset.comment: An identifier that separates assertions into different 'datasets' that came from different sources or processes.

surfaceText.comment: The natural language text that corresponds to a node. The @value of this object is the actual text, and the @language is its language code.

surfaceStart.comment: The natural language text that corresponds to the 'start' value (subject) of this assertion.

surfaceEnd.comment: The natural language text that corresponds to the 'end' value (subject) of this assertion.

license.comment: A link to the Creative Commons license under which you can remix or redistribute this information.

contributor.comment: A person or resource that contributed an assertion in ConceptNet.

process.comment: An identifier for a computational process that led to an assertion in ConceptNet.

activity.comment: An identifier for a crowd-sourcing activity that led to an assertion in ConceptNet.

seeAlso.comment: Links to this term in other Linked Data resources.
